sourcesContent: import { useContext } from 'react'; import { EmployeeContext } from '../contexts/EmployeeContext'; import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Employee = ({ employee }) => { const { deleteEmployee } = useContext(EmployeeContext) return ( <> {employee.name} {employee.age} {employee.address} {employee.gender} {employee.about} Modal title ) } export default Employee;
